title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
**"Transform Your Workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash**

Upgrade your office or home workspace with the stylish and functional Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, available in a beautiful Blonde Ash finish. This spacious desk, measuring 59 inches wide, is perfect for managing your professional tasks or adding elegance to your personal space.

**Durable Design**
Constructed from high-quality medium-density fiberboard and coated with scratch-resistant and water-spill resistant paper laminate finish, this desk boasts both style and durability. With ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards compliance, you can trust that the Magellan Desk is not only attractive but also built to last.

**Versatile Storage Solutions**
Maximize your workspace efficiency with a variety of storage options: a slide-out keyboard tray for ergonomic comfort, three box drawers, one file drawer, and one large keyboard tray that can be used as an additional drawer – all adding up to a total of four drawers. With the recommended use for both home and professional environments, the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk is designed to meet your organizational needs.

**Handling with Care**
Although this desk may be heavy and oversized, we offer in-home assembly service for your convenience. Please contact us at 866-388-4350 to schedule a professional installation team. For larger teams or workspaces, consider the Realspace® Magellan series' expansive range of office furniture designed to fit your evolving needs.

Transform your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash – combining timeless style and functional design for a versatile and durable solution.

**Advertising Description:**

Transform your workspace into a modern and functional haven with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. This exquisitely designed desk, measuring 59 inches in width, is not just a piece of furniture but an investment that offers both style and practicality.

Crafted from high-quality Medium-density fiberboard with a durable paper laminate finish, this desk boasts a Blonde Ash color that complements any decor while providing scratch-resistant and water-spill resistant surfaces for added peace of mind. Its dimensions make it the perfect medium-sized addition to your home or professional space.

The Realspace® Magellan Computer Desk comes equipped with an array of convenient features, including a slide-out keyboard tray and four drawers - one file drawer, three box drawers, and one for your keyboard. These practical storage solutions help keep your workspace organized and clutter-free.

In adherence to the highest industry standards, this desk has been ANSI/BIFMA tested and compliant. With its impressive durability and resistance, you can count on it to withstand daily use while maintaining its sleek appearance.

Handling this heavy and oversized item may require additional assistance. For a hassle-free setup experience, in-home assembly service is available for your convenience. Simply contact our dedicated team at 866-388-4350 to schedule an appointment. Upgrade your workspace today with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk – where sophistication meets functionality!

Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash – a stylish and functional addition to your home office or professional workspace. Measuring an impressive 59 inches in width, this desk boasts ample space for your computer setup and essential work materials.

Crafted from high-quality medium-density fiberboard and finished with a sleek Paper laminate, the Realspace® Magellan Desk not only looks great but is also built to last. This versatile desk comes equipped with a range of convenient features, including one slide-out keyboard tray for optimal ergonomics, three box drawers, one file drawer, and a total of four drawers. Its recommended use includes both home and professional settings, making it a must-have for those who demand both style and functionality from their workspace.

The Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk is ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards compliant, ensuring that it meets the highest standards in durability, strength, and safety. Although it arrives disassembled, assembly service is available for those who need an extra helping hand (contact number: 866-388-4350).

Heavy and oversized, this desk may require more than one person to handle during transportation and installation. Don't let its size intimidate you – instead, embrace the power of a well-designed workspace that will elevate your productivity and professionalism. Order yours today!
